thread.title: 76ers fans rip GM Bryan Colangelo on Twitter after Nerlens Noel trade to Mavericks
thread.title_full: 76ers fans rip GM Bryan Colangelo on Twitter after Nerlens Noel trade to Mavericks

author: Jonathan Tannenwald
title: 76ers fans rip GM Bryan Colangelo on Twitter after Nerlens Noel trade to Mavericks
text:
76ers fans rip GM Bryan Colangelo on Twitter after Nerlens Noel trade to Mavericks Updated: February 23, 2017 — 2:20 PM EST 35 Share 0 Comment Popular Stories 
Let's have a look at how 76ers fans are reacting to Thursday's deadline day trade that sent Nerlens Noel to the Dallas Mavericks. 
Actually, before we do, you might want to grab the nearest hard hat. 
Okay, are you ready? Here goes... 
Why is Nerlens Noel gone for 2 average players and an average pick when WE STILL HAVE JAHLIL OKAFOR ON THE ROSTER. Sorry. #TrustTheProcess 
— Jake Smith (@Dylsm) February 23, 2017 
Well then. Let's see what else comes along... 
"We will not make a bad trade" Colangelo states before trading Nerlens Noel for two second round picks. What a lieing dope of a GM 
— Ryan Tag (@RyanTag1) February 23, 2017 
Nerlens Noel went for the same as Ilyasova. That's that's alarmingly bad value Bry Colang. 
— Tall Guy (@dunk_sauce) February 23, 2017 
Question for @Sixers - Are you announcing @thenorthface as your next sponsor, because Bryan Colangelo got fleeced. #TrustTheProcess 
— Ronnie Pasceri (@RonPasceri) February 23, 2017 
But I thought people didn't like Sam Hinkie? Or at least, that's what I've been told so often? Could it be that... he was right? 
I'm just saying @samhinkie most definitely did not die for THIS. 
— DJ Roomba (@Rundjc24) February 23, 2017 
. @samhinkie please come back 
Sam Hinkie was ridiculed for turning bad players into second-round picks. 
Bryan Colangelo is turning good players into second-round picks. 
— Zach Harris¯\_(ツ)_/¯ (@ZachGHarris) February 23, 2017 
If you were wondering how fast Bryan Colangelo would ruin everything Sam Hinkie worked towards, we've got our answer #TradeDeadline https://t.co/mg5eababyE 
— Jordan Marryott (@JMarryott23) February 23, 2017 
Even the Philadelphia Police are annoyed with the trade. 
Hello, @DallasPD - Can I report a theft? 
Here's another way to put it: Click here for a live list of Twitter search results for the phrase "Colangelo fleeced." The list is long. I wonder if that means anything.
